name: Gamer Girls 2
description:
Gamer Girls 2 is a casual block game. There are 10 different scenes with little stories. You can move figures to pass the level and you will unlock the girl’s stories and dynamic CGs.
Game Features:
10 cute and beautiful scenes with girls
Popular gameplay
Using animation technology, let girls CG move
30 exciting game levels
This story is purely fictional. Any resemblance to actual individuals or events are coincidental.
All characters in this game are over the age of 18.
